2631.name: ACCOUNT_ALREADY_DELETED
2631.message:
This user cannot use network services.

The Nintendo Network ID linked to this
user has been deleted.
2631.short_description: The account linked to the user has been deleted.
2631.long_description: The account linked to the user has been deleted.
2631.short_solution: Link a new Nintendo/Pretendo Network ID to the user.
2631.long_solution: Link a new Nintendo/Pretendo Network ID to the user.
